sourcesContent:
import { useNavigate, useRef } from 'react-router-dom' import { Checkbox } from 'antd'; import './login.css' export default function LoginPage() { document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden' const navigate = useNavigate(), login = useRef(null), shiftToSignup = () => { let login = document.getElementById("login"), signup = document.getElementById("signup") login.classList.remove("login-slide-in") login.classList.add("login-slide-out") signup.classList.remove("signup-slide-out") signup.classList.add("signup-slide-in") }, shiftToLogin = () => { let login = document.getElementById("login"), signup = document.getElementById("signup") signup.classList.remove("signup-slide-in") signup.classList.add("signup-slide-out") login.classList.remove("login-slide-out") login.classList.add("login-slide-in") } function onLogin() { navigate("/home") } function onSignup() { navigate("/home") } return (
